entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
